SELECT B.RECORD_ID AS recordId, B.FILE_ID AS fileId,F.TITLE AS title,F.FILE_CODE AS fileCode,F.SUBJECT AS subject,F.FILE_TYPE AS fileType,F.SECRET_LEVEL AS secretLevel, B.BEGIN_TIME AS beginTime,B.END_TIME AS endTime,B.APPROVAL_STATUS AS approvalStatus,B.APPROVAL_USER AS approvalUser,B.APPROVAL_TIME AS approvalTime, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=B.CREATE_USER) AS createUserName FROM ARCHIVES_BORROW_FILE B LEFT JOIN ARCHIVES_FILE F ON B.ORG_ID=F.ORG_ID AND B.FILE_ID=F.FILE_ID WHERE B.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND B.APPROVAL_STATUS = '0'
AND B.APPROVAL_USER=#{accountId}
